name: Seppo
description:
Seppo. 

The man, the myth, a true living legend has ran out of beers and it is your mission to wander trough frozen wastelands called Finland to get more.

This is our teams entry to 2D-platformer games.

This game was created as part of Centria University of Applied Sciences Pelipaja Game Lab-project.

Producer:  Nocatplusplus

Programming: Alex  & Viljami

Artwork & Animation: Vilu
